name: Age of Empires: The Rise of Rome
name_original: Age of Empires: The Rise of Rome
description:
Age of Empires: The Rise of Rome is a strategy game developed by Ensemble Studios. It came out on 31-10-1998. It was published by Microsoft Studios. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Age of Empires: The Rise of Rome on PC.
David Rippy, Stuart Moulder and Tim Znamenacek produced the game. Tony Goodman directed the game. David Rippy, Rob Wallace and Stephen Rippy scored the game.
